title: Register
description: The Rabbithole app is in closed beta testing. To register, you need to request an invitation code from the developer.

createInvoice.title: Create an invoice
createInvoice.description: To start using the Rabbit Hole, you need to create a journal. To create a journal, you need to pay ~${{ usd }} (equivalent to {{ xdr }} XDR) in ICP.

createJournal.title: Create a journal
createJournal.description: Everything is ready to start creating your journal.
